name: Onkel Otto

review text: This place is just incredible! The food is SO good and very well served (be ready to happily eat a lot). The staff is lovely. The only warning for tourists is that they take cash or paypal, so I’d recommend having a bit of money. A must go if your passing by the city!

This place has been recommended to me during my trip in Stuttgart and I have to say that it lived up to the recommendation. Each of their schnitzel were massive (even the smaller portioned ones). The schnitzel here were one of the best and …
Great food, calm atmosphere. HUGE portions and great prices.

Fantastic place! XXL Schnitzel and all you can eat on Sunday. So many different schnitzels to choose from. We went for a friend's birthday and the staff was very nice and accommodating. The price is reasonable. The food is delicious. The beer was cold and tasty. I highly recommend this place! We will definitely return!

One of the best schnitzels I have ever had! If you love schnitzels and can bring a big appetite with you,  then this restaurant is a must. You can have an xl schnitzel 300g or xxl schnitzel 600g. Wash it down with great locally brewed beer …

We ordered Viannese style schnitzel as XXL portion with extra plate. The portions were perfect for two people, the taste was delicious. We also recommend to order Maultaschen soup. The service is prompt. The atmosphere is warm and would serve both for family or friend groups very well.
Excellent Schnitzel restaurant. Not right in the centre but great German hospitality and atmosphere. Food is very large and comes with a variety of sauces. Highly recommend
Great value for the money,  huge portions, taste was OK, but the service guy was stressed and therefore not super friendly.

The food was ok. Served quickly, big portions, some locals were eating there, so apparently not worse than any other similar place. If you don't like German cuisine, go elsewhere. Everything is  fried, fat and salty. Makes sense to buy XXL …
They have a very good schnitzel and it is enormous. The environment is cozy and the staff is good. The prices are average and very good if you consider how good the schnitzel is.

HIGHLIGHT: Oversized schnitzels in an array of variations washed down with local beer in a rustic tavern.

name: Perbacco

review text: It’s a nice place for dinner. I liked the pesto fresh pasta and the combination of burrata tomato and the pasta was absolutely perfect. The pizza could be better!

Great restaurant
I ordered pizza and pasta,, they were delicious

Food was fantastic: I had the tomato soup, homemade pasta and seafood, and the panna cotta dessert. Homemade pasta was fantastic! Wait staff were friendly and responsive. Atmosphere is okay, it is a busy place so don't expect a quiet …

Superb Italian food in the middle of the city.

This restaurant and bar offers great variety of delicious plates and cocktails. …
guess our fav Italian place downtown. never been disappointed . the pasta fruit di mare is the cracker on the regular menu at least for us 😁 great service too and reasonable prices …
Vegie pizza, arabibiata pasta we ordered. Food was good and tasty. Ambience is good.
Nice restaurant and friendly staff, also food was good.
Good food good wine and good service. No complaints. Paid about 50 for myself

Fresh food prepared to its best and the standard of Top notch restaurants.Presentation was excellent.They really care for the customer and I find it really good.The huge offering of the Italien food is mind blowing.Inwoulf recommend it to everyone
My favourite Italian restaurant in Stuttgart, gorgeous ambience, excellent, friendly service & great food! Excellent location too & has both indoor & outdoor dining

HIGHLIGHT: Aperitifs, antipasti, pasta dishes & pizzas in an understated restaurant/bar.

name: SCHWEIZERS RESTAURANT

review text: Absolutely delicious. Plate after plate, it was fantastic. Perfect spot for celebrating something special!

It was truly delightful. I got the 6 course menu (without the cheese) and smiled so much that my cheeks hurt by the end of the night. Get the wine pairings and a taxi home rather than driving. The only thing to note is that you are very unlikely to get a walk in. So call a few days in advance.

This place is just amazing. Everything is just perfect. The service is very attentive and nice. You feel very welcome. The food is just amazing and you get really great value for your money. Cannot recommend this enough. I think that this is currently the best restaurant in Stuttgart.

My favourite fine-dining restaurant in Stuttgart. We had a wonderful fish menu with wine-pairing. In my opinion they truly deserve a Michelin Star award. I hope they survive the COVID shutdown and I can visit them soon.

The reviews do not lie! This is a very wonderful intimate restaurant, where you can just relax, sit back and enjoy the gastronomic delight that they have to offer. I had a 5 course meal and I was very very impressed and satisfied with my …

Gero Schweizer cooks up a storm with accents of local ingredients at his restaurant serving French cuisine. The menu was refined and delicious, and I particularly loved it when the same ingredient showed up in three guises on the same plate. Who would have thought that duck liver ice cream can be this sublime?

This is a great addition to Stuttgart's evolving dining scene. I was impressed by the quality of the food and its preparation. The service was great as well, with a personal touch. I particularly enjoyed that the atmosphere was not too stiff. It was a great evening and I am happy to visit this little gem again.
Very good food. Atmosphere was a bit tweedy. Personnel very friendly.

I don't know why this place has such good reviews. The food is not too bad, you can see that they are trying to be creative. But our visit was a complete failure. Dinner lasted over 3.5 hours, with intervals of up to 40 minutes between …

Brilliant welcome Brilliant food quality Brilliant service What a wonderfull evening Thank you and we hope to come fast again. I also chose to have each dish accompanied with a wine pairing and found each glass to be a perfect match - even …

HIGHLIGHT: White-tablecloth French nook in an art nouveau house with seasonal, creative dishes & wine pairings.

name: Gasthaus Bären

review text: Was not easy to find but it was worth the time to find it! The food is Tapas Style wich means small portions but with five or more portions are enough to fill your apettite. The service was great and very friendly, i highly recommend this Restaurant when in town in Stuttgart visit it ITS worth trying.

I really liked this German tapas place.
The most attentive service I have seen in Stuttgart, amazing Schönbuch beers. I'd definitely recommend this place. The atmosphere is top.

We came for a birthday party with a very large group. Overall the staff were excellent, the ambience was loud and proud for a Brauhaus feel, and everyone was served quickly their food and drinks. Some of the dishes were delicious like the …

Nice place to bring foreign friends.
You can show them a bit of many schwäbisch foods.
I live here but I still like to go time to time 😄
Staffs are very friendly too. …
Interesting mixture between Schwäbisch food and a tapas approach. The portions come on small plates and are good to share.

Enjoyed my first Swabian tapas experience courtesy of a local friend, one that was very heavy on carbs 😂 (carb lovers, take note). We ordered 7 dishes, many of which consisted of potatoes. Having the beetroot salad and mixed vegetables …

Excellent place to eat, good service, very popular. Dishes are ment to be shared, this is a tapas type restaurant, althrough is german contemporary food. Need to reserve in advance, not a good option if you need a quiet place because it all open tables and very close to eachother.
Cool idea to have Swabian dishes as tapas. It is perfect to try the typical food from the region. We liked the Käsespätzle, the Maultaschen and the turkey with sauce. …

Probably the best place for dinner if you are the first time in Stuttgart. Here you have great opportunitity to try different positions from local cuisine. Everything was really tasty, fresh,and local. Also good local wine and beer :) Staff …
I took a friend here for his birthday and we both loved it. I really enjoy the concept of sharing small German dishes with others.

HIGHLIGHT: Warm restaurant with stylish decor & sidewalk seating, plus a bar & shared plates.

name: Platzhirsch

review text: It's a nice place to have a bite and a drink. The food was tasty, the portions were good and the prices were also fair. The interior design could be improved.

Selected those place before reading excellent reviews and wondered if it would be as good as everybody said. It was better. This place has great service and the best dinner I have had yet in Germany. I had the schnitzel spatzle and the cinnamon pancake with apple sauce for dessert.
Nice place for a lunch on a lovely square. I liked the pancake with cheese and ham.

A relax place with nice atmosphere with several options to snack if you are hungry. The porcion of the foot is fitting the price. The people working there are friendly and kind. So in conclusion a really nice to stop by if your find yourself in the city center
Great staff! The food was good. They helped us figure out what to get since we don't know much German.

Platzhirsch is nicely located at the Hans im Glück Brunnen. So especially in the summer it's always packed outside! The food was decent, nothing extraordinary. Schnitzel with fries and couscous with vegetables, humus and yoghurt could have been a bit more flavourful.
Food and drinks were pretty good, but upstairs can get quiet crowdy. Also, they still allow smoking indoors?!

It’s a very good restaurant to try German dishes. The food is really good, the portions are good as well. It’s very tasty and I’m definitely coming back there again. The drinks are also good, the service is very friendly and nice. We had a good time there. The staff also speak good English and are very helpful.

Great place to have a beer and people watch at hand im glück brunnen.
Food was great too. Our members play board games upstairs. Very few places in the city with Magners cider on tap (except the Irish pubs) so if you are a fan of …
Delicious food

HIGHLIGHT: Classic German dishes like schnitzel & noodles in a venue with a mountain mural & a beer garden.

name: Augustenstüble

review text: Love this French restaurant. Super friendly staff, great food and very friendly and extensive (when you ask) wine recommendation. Highly recommended place and I will come back again soon!

3 or 4 course menu with multiple options for each course and an eye for wine pairings. We had wonderful food and service.
FYI - they only accept cash or Mastercard (not Visa)

we were 12 People nevertheless the Service was quick and friendly with good advice for every Person at the table. the recommended menu of the day is a good choice because it is well balanced and the wine Pairing is well Chosen. so not a Michelin star Restaurant but a very good Location. recommend

Very very good French Restaurant. I had the menu of the day with the wine Pairing. I was a Little skeptish of the wine pairing as with a first taste to some glasses, the wine was not my favorite. However, when consumed with the course, the …

Ask the chef for the wine that goes best with your courses, as he knows what is in his cellar.  Amazing recipes even for "standard"-dishes.  They work on spices, texture,...  and they do it really well.
Best fish dish I ate for long!....
Elegant restaurant serving delicious local food.
Excellent
Lovely staff
Just great!

HIGHLIGHT: Innovative French bistro fare & fine wines presented in a warm atmosphere with sidewalk seats.

name: Hans im Glück

review text: Place is cozy.  Burgers are yummy and wide selection drinks menu. Aside from tasty food, you have servers with very good service attitude and patience. We told them we were sharing a burger and when it came, it was properly cut into 2 and …

The food and drinks here are delicious and they serve vegetarian as well as non vegetarian options. The staff is very kind and considerate. Had a  positive experience visiting this place. If you visit before 5pm they have a good deal on lunch menu.

One of the best place in stuttgart where you get vegetarian burger. The seating capacity here is very huge and pleasant ambience. You could choose meal option where you get a cool/ cold drink, burger, fries, hot drink (your choice in each option). The food tastes good . The staffs are friendly

Awesome place to eat with lots of vegetarian Orion’s, really nice staff who are helpful and friendly. Wheelchair accessible with a outdoor dining available (specifically during summer). Burger sauces and sweet potato fries are the best. The dessert Omas Geheimnis was also tasty.
Nice food, friendly staff! Vegetarian burger available, cozy interior and many tables for groups.

The food and drinks offered at the establishment were of high quality, however, the service provided by the waiters was severely lacking. I was shocked to witness one of them taking a sip from a customer's drink, a clear violation of health …

Hands down the best burger place in Baden-Württemberg. A friend of mine took us to this place two years ago, we tried AvocadoKönig burger and sweat potato fries, it was absolutely brilliant - avocado never tasted better. Two weeks ago I …

The Menu for 2 people it was:

- Avocado Burger with potatoes …

Great experience
We ordered two Burgers meet and chicken both were good 10/7
-fries 10/7
Place is great but make sure to have reservations else it gets difficult. We ordered the veggie/vegan burgers and they certainly were amazing. We went for the abends menu (evening/dinner menu) …

name: Little Italy Restaurant

review text: Super good for foods and wines 😍 service also excellent …
Very nice and authentic little Italian restaurant. It is family owned. Price are super fair and food is really good. The restaurant is very small, so a reservation is recommended.
A bit hidden place with tasty food, low prices and great service!
I liked this place a lot. The food is amazing and the waiter Carlo was very nice and friendly. Will visit again :)
Delicious food, especially the tomato soup. Great pizza and lasagna too! Very small, casual, and friendly place.  Highly recommended.

Nice little Italian restaurant situated on a quiet street. The staff was very friendly and helpful with our takeaway order, and the food was tasty with big portions. The garden looked really cosy too, we almost regretted not eating there.
Very nice place.  Small, quiet and peaceful.  Great food.  and good service.

Pizza was simply the best I have eaten in Stuttgart - real Italy taste. Fantastically delicious!!
Strongly recommend!

The server was very kind to two very jet-lagged Americans who had just arrived to Stuttgart that evening. Even though it was only an hour or so prior to closing, they pleasantly served us a delicious meal that was much appreciated after a …
Special evening with absolutely delicious food ! Thank you for everything 😊 …

HIGHLIGHT: Pasta, pizza & typical Italian mains, plus house specials, in a relaxed, pared-down venue.

name: Weinstube Kachelofen
HIGHLIGHT: Homestyle specialties, beers & wines are dished up in this old-fashioned restaurant with a terrace.

name: Bocca Buona Restaurant

review text:
Not so bad. Menu is narrow. And smthg was missing, but you get info just in case you order it. Different treatment on guests.
The question if we do book? Seems a bit strange, when restaurant is really not full... fish was a bit too salt and liquid...

I had a nice dinner, food was fast and service was impeccable.
The food was also good, but it is just nothing special at all and for that it is too expensive in my opinion. The idea is nice, you'll get a grappa or limoncello in the end. But it feels a bit trying too much for what it delivers.

Awesome experience! Thanks to Waheed for going above and beyond for our dinner! Great customer service! We really enjoy his company and his attention to the detail! The stay at the hotel was a pleasure!

Great Italian food. The menu is limited but in my opinion sufficient in Corona time. If you enjoy authentic Italian cuisine then try this restaurant. We stayed in the Park Inn Radisson and this is their restaurant. The ambiance is …
Delicious food. It may not be true Italian kitchen, but their style is very good. Service was outstanding!
We had a beautiful time in the hotel the food is very Delicious the staff is helpful
Nice service and great food; the place got a romantic vibe to it, perfect for a date, but also to go with family. I'd come back
The food was good, but the waiter is a bit aggressive

Very great service and rather average food.

First of all I was very, very happy about the service. The waiter was very …

The menu is very limited, a few pastas and pizza's. I did not like the pizza crust/dough. My SO had a pasta which was very basic. This restaurant is owned by the hotel (in the same building). Service was good though.

name: MALO
HIGHLIGHT: International dishes, cocktails & wines served in a stylish, plant-filled eatery with a terrace.

name: Afro Küche/Kitchen

review text: Ate here a few months ago. I am usually disappointed with other African Restaurants due to their lack of minimum quality in their food and service and I usually do not bother leaving a comment. For this Restaurant I decide I should let …
A restaurant to be.. Very clean nd services are good. Food taste great 👌🏾 …
I was here and try it so good service and nice place and so delicious food 😊 …
It nice and the food is tasty
Wir waren zu fünft in den Restaurant und ich kann es allen nur weiter empfehlen 😁 …
Keine Ahnung wie das Essen da ist, aber Tim wohnt nebenan in der 33. Dort wollen wir dieses Wochenende ein bisschen feiern. Habe ein bisschen Angst
Super leckeren Essen und dir Mitarbeiter sind sehr freundlich. Kann es nur empfehlen, ein authentisches Westafrikanisches Restaurant.

Mega Bar -Restaurant ,die Küche schmeckt unglaublich.Und die Preisen sind auch günstig..Die Bedienung ist nett,schnell und zuverlässig. Also kann ich nur noch empfehlen.Da fühlt man sich einfach wie zu hause.
Danke Destiny und an deinem Team
Authentische nigerianische Küche. Sehr gepfegt. Nettes Personal. Feines Essen. Breite Auswahl

Mein liebstes Lokal zum Karaokesingen mit Felix!!!!
Toller Service und gutes Essen!!!

name: Jose y Josefina

review text:
Spanish Cuisine,
Highly recommend this restaurant. Indoor and outdoor seating. Be sure to make a reservation because the hype and quality is real. Food for both (vegetarians and …

Lovely Spanish restaurant, spotless dining room and very tasty food. Great sharing plates and some very nice fish. Looking forward to trying some paella next time. A couple of mix ups with our dishes stopped me giving it a 5 but overall a great meal.
I was in Madrid for a while, I can tell this restaurant which operate by Spanish people is taste real Spanish way. The fish soup was so amazing that I think I cant find another one in Stuttgart. …

We went their for dinner. The place is so cozy. We were welcomed by the manager and took our jackets and gave us our table. The staff is super friendly. The food is amazing, we have ordered Patatas Bravas, calamari , lamb and grilled …

Very cozy place, the food was above all praise!
The service was great too, and the waiters were really nice.
I recommend this restaurant!
I come here exclusively for the calamari. No other place in Stuttgart to get it this good for all you calamari lovers 😍 …
Absolutely magnificent! We will be back! Service is exceptional, quick, very nice staff, excellent food and drinks!

Super service + awesome flavor
We always visit there whenever we have anniversary
I really like the environment, the waitress was extremely kind and helpful. The food was good, I ll say 4/5 but the price was a bit expensive.

The food was excellent. Had patatas bravas, garlic shrimp, and one other course which I cannot recall other than that I was not disappointed. I will say that this is not a place to eat at solo. This is definitely meant for more communal …

HIGHLIGHT: Polished, family-run kitchen offering refined Spanish dishes in an intimate environment.

name: Safran Restaurant Stuttgart

review text: The service and the staff’s behaviour is a nightmare, they gave us limited time and served the food in the very last 30 minutes. The first dish was taken in the moment the person finished their food and that was a rally afterwards to take …

The minced meat was so tender. The first mouth I had blew me away.

A few pieces of meat were tough. …
Very nice restaurant, nice and kind staff, very delicious food, definitely recommend 👍👍😍 …
Really tasty + a nice atmosphere. The place gets quite full, so reserve in advance. Try the desert : baklava with tea, a perfect finish of your meal :) …

We decided to try Persian food in Stuttgart and couldn’t be happier, from the service to small details on the dishes, everything was amazing, kashke bademjoon as they told us was super good but the best part was soltani( koobideh and barg) …

The food was so delicious and the staff were so lovely and helpful.
I didn't taste a good Persian food since a while but this was so Perfect.
Try Kobeda and also one of the best Jujeh kabab I tried. …

Super nice & cozy restaurant, feels like the owner really want to make sure the guests enjoy the food! Tasty, freshly made good. Dishes that we have eaten were unique. Also in our second visit the experience was 5/5.
Good Food and good service but on expensive side...  Good vegetarian options but the taste was oakyish

The portion was not enough for two people, as the lady told us it was for two people. She claimed it was halal, but I couldn't find any halal signage.On the menu, that plate shows around $20 and says for 2 people, but she said not and …

The worst persian restaurant i ever tried in my life.
Food not made in original persian way.
Bad cleaning standards. …

name: Vetter Essen & Trinken

review text: This place offers really good Swabian food, actually the best I know in Stuttgart. Fantastic wine menu, a welcoming team with a fast service and a casual area to sit outside in summer. Quite elevated prices however worth it and fine for a special dinner. Would recommend!

Outstanding dinner! Reservations are required. The service was fantastic. We don't speak or read German but our lovely waitress explained a good portion of the menu so we knew what to order. The menu changes but I understand that the schnitzel is a must-have. My father-in-law had it and loved it.
Wonderful place. Excellent food, especially the sauces. Nice interior. Good value for money. Absolutely recommended.

Whether food or ambient, this restaurant is amazing. If you’re looking for a good Swabian food, Vetter is the place to be.
PS: Staff is lovely!

The salad for the schnitzel was great. Never had anything like it. The schnitzel was the best in town. The Thai soup was also good especially at $7euro. My steak with noodles had great taste. The steak had some chewy fat that I could have …
BOUILABAISSE, cow tongue and monkfish! All the side dishes or garnish is almost top of the top!

My wife and I were joking about the name, as the food was really good (handwritten menu) and we would get fatter (Vetter in German) after eating there. Make sure to make a reservation, we were lucky to get a spot reserved only at 21:00. Great food, great wine and atmosphere under the nearby trees in this quiet street.

We went there as a group of four with two. My wife and I had never been before, but our friends had been several times. The bar was set high and Vetter lived up to the hype. The best Schwäbisch meal that I have had yet. Service was curt but …

Best Schnitzel in Stuttgart. Wine selection is good. Salad is fresh with a nice selection of appetizers. Bring your glasses because the menu is hand written and difficult to read. Parking is minimal on the streets. But the food is …

The spare ribs are very delicious, the best I've every had in my life. The bread is very tasty. We had chocolate melt cake for desert, yummmm, everything is top notch, our server is attentive, will definitely come back next time I visit Berlin!

name: Weinstube Zur Kiste

review text: Small hole in the wall kind of place, with a serious historical connection. The staff are very welcoming and menu offering typical local dishes. You share the table with other people. Generous portions, the Gaisburger Marsch soup and the stuffed pasta are highly recommended. Don’t forget excellent dessert. Recommend!

I super recommend this restaurant, you feel that you are at a German family home. The restaurant is definitely traditional German. Is perfect to show to your foreign friends what is the real German and tasty food. …

Amazing experience. Our server was amazing; she was able to fit us in, recommended amazing dishes the onion roast and meatballs both were great, and super friendly. In fact, my Italian girlfriend said they were the best meatballs she ever …
Very good local restaurant,  good service with a very tasty dishes.

It's a Stuttgart classic. While very 'famous' for their food. It is nothing special or in any way better than any other place. It is 'cult' but really just a standard swabian wine pub. Nothing wrong with it, but neither particularly worth going to.
Delicious, homely Swabian food — I’ll go back whenever I’m next in Stuttgart!
Very special place full of tradition and history, very good and tasty food, kind and friendly service, very nice experience there.

Fabulous!! Hidden gem. Food, drinks & staff were wonderful.

Highly recommended!
Amazing food, lovely host and a great atmosphere!

Great service from pleasant staff, were seated promptly. The ingredients are fresh And locally sourced, however the prices remain low. Sis and I stopped by here throughout a shopping trip, splendid food and rapid service. The personnel had …

HIGHLIGHT: Robust Swabian fare, plus beer & wine, in a simple, cozy 19th-century tavern with wood paneling.

name: Noodle 1 Dining

review text: It’s a good experience. Amazing noodle and service. A lovely place at the street corner~

Brilliant food, so so location outside

Went there while looking for some lunch. …

The dishes are good - almost perfect. Especially for vegans there are some options which I can recommend. The staff is extremely friendly. But I still don’t know if this should be a Vietnamese restaurant or just a cliche East Asian …

The best noodle in town! Since I moved to Stuttgart, I’m looking for a decent Asian food restaurant. This one doesn’t disappoint! I had the Singapore Wok and it was amazing, truly impressive. My friend had another noodle (photo) and she was …
First time trying this place but it won’t be the last. The food and the drinks are fabulous.

Very delicious and authentic quality food.
Will definitely come back to this place.
Good place to go eat Good food. Stopped by here on a whim and hand delicious food.

Food was good, and also the place is fine… But  CASH ONLY? In 2022? This only exists in Germany. Also the prices got super high, they charged for one not very big soup 18$, a beer is 5$ and Aperol 7$.
Great selection of food and drink, my dinner was delicious! Service was decent. Fun outdoor seating on the corner of a busy intersection.  Cash only!
The food is just amazing here, and the service is also great.

HIGHLIGHT: Spicy Vietnamese curries, spring rolls & noodle dishes in a simple setup with sidewalk bench tables.

name: Vegi Stuttgart

review text: Their falafel pitas are the best I’ve ever had. Also their special hummus are so creative and surprising every time. Especially great for a late night snack or quick lunch
UPDATE: perfect place for lunch or quick dinner. Sauce and hummus are still great and this time we tried their falafel plate which were fantastic. …
Vegan falafels, quick and friendly service, delicious, need a creamy vegan tzatziki option 🙂 …
One if the best veggie places in stuttgart. The sauces and additions are good really quality and taste really good. The staff are also very nice
Legendary late night falafel! Interesting sauces with a daily special hummus. Just remember to take a few napkins if you get the bread.

One of the best vegetarian recommendations! 🤩 The food is simple and delicious! There's 2 options, falafel in pita bread or a plate. You have multiple options of sauces as well. The mango sauce with peanut spread was excellent. The falafel are unbelievably fresh and crunchy and juicy!😍 …
I never knew Vegan food could taste this good till my friend randomly took me out to this place. Food is first class. The best place for eating vegan food in Stuttgart.

This is one of my favorite places in Stuttgart. You can usually see a line to order and it is really clear to see why. The prices are good and the quality of the food is amazing. I ate their falafel plate and fries. The staff is really …

4/4/23
The falafel itself was very good and light on the palate, it wasn't overly fried and oily. The sauces ranging from aubergine-tomato to yogurt were excellent. …
Tasty food, quick service, friendly staff. One of the best vegetarian food I have had. There are multiple sauce options along with toppings. …

HIGHLIGHT: Humble, tiny vegetarian eatery specializing in pita pockets filled with falafel, veggies & sauces.

name: Meze meze stuttgart
HIGHLIGHT: Charming, petite restaurant dishing up traditional Greek meze, seafood & meat dishes, plus drinks.

name: Speisekammer West

review text:
High quality bio and organic food.
A lot of good vegan and vegetarian options.
Calm and relaxed atmosphere.
Organic food, spotless location and facilities and delicious swabian meals. Love it!

The menu is select providing a range of locally sourced dishes. I was there when the white asparagus was in season and had that with a selection of local hams as a main course.  The decor is modern but not cold; the staff very friendly. The wine list features interesting local wines and a few foreign options.

The welcome and subsequent service was warm and friendly and they were happy to accommodate my lack of German. The menu is select providing a range of locally sourced dishes. I was there when the white asparagus was in season and had that …
Excellent service, great food, options for meat lovers as well as vegetarians
Very good restaurant, a bit expensive though, but it is completely worth it

Quite a shame that this place changed so much. They have a very small menu, which is usually a good sign as they can concentrate on creating a perfect dish. Sadly this is no longer the case here. Our food was stale and our meat was …
Great service, great food. Be advised you have to pay for street parking, but only a euro or two. They do not take credit card, CASH ONLY!! Would be 5 stars if they took credit card.

Very nice restaurant with local food - extremely delicious and healthy food. Of course also some sins are offered like the hot brownie with ice. Just wow!!
A lot of vegetarian food that is very good
top!

name: AMADEUS Restaurant & Bar

review text: We had a lovely dinner in the outside courtyard of Amadeus.  The weather was sunny and perfect for a dinner outdoors. We enjoyed the white asparagus served with a plate of cold cut hams. We also had a plate of Swabian delights including a …

Delightful Culinary Experience at Amadeus!

I recently had the pleasure of dining at the magnificent restaurant, Amadeus, …
Friendly stuff, delicious food! The restaurant is so nice, cozy, and ideal for Sunday brunch. We really enjoyed it! 😍 …
Nice restaurant with a nice beer garden outside. The lunch menu was very tasty. Recommended.

The boyfriend loves coming here. We usually go at least twice a month. He usually orders the Spätzle. I, however, have had some hits and misses with the food. Sometimes the food is great, sometimes it lacks. I really think it depends on the …

Wonderful food, and awesome location next to major Charlottenplatz U-Bahn Station. Biergarten May-October. I have have had breakfast, lunch and dinner here. Service is good and they have menus in English (a bonus). I highly recommend this establishment.

Very nice atmosphere. Lot of tables and some standing tables nevertheless it is better to book. Dishes are generous and the taste is good. The service is somehow slow but ok. Prices are affordable, about 45 Eur for 2 on a Saturday evening. No PK, so better to come with the tram "Charlotten Platz" station is just few meters away.
Hot evening so sat outside, really nice atmosphere. Menus available in English and staff very helpful. The meal was delicious with Generous portions. The local house red is lovely
The service is friendly and efficient. During the summer there is a decent size beergarden in the inner courtyard. Have not tried the food yet.
Amazing ambience, high quality and very delicious “home made style” food. Definitely will come back.

HIGHLIGHT: Informal eatery & terrace serving local & global food, plus wine, cocktails & craft beer.

name: Laguna - Spanisches Restaurant

review text:
Very nice chef/owner.
Quite cozy considering it’s next to the street.
The food was good and very good value for price.
Excellent food and service. Very special place.

Cozy place, friendly staff and great food,
I highly recommend.
Good food. Nice Spanish food.
The food was absolutely delicious!
Top Paella
Amazing tapas

Nie wieder. Man weiß gar nicht, wo man anfangen soll. Waren zwischen 12.00 Uhr bis 13.00 Uhr die einzigen Gäste. Alles schmuddelig und ungepflegt. Der Außenbereich sagt schon alles. Ich habe höflich gefragt, ob ich Fotos machen darf, was …
Sehr authentischer Spanier mit künstlerischen Gattin haben uns sehr nett empfangen . Charmante Atmosphäre.Absolut gute Qualität, sehr lecker Tapas und Fisch gegessen. Wir kommen wieder!
Traumhaft schönes Restaurant, super nette Besitzer und absolut leckeres Essen. Eine Paella genauso lecker wie in Spanien. Wir kommen immer wieder gern hier her und können es nur wärmstens empfehlen.

name: BURREATOS

review text: Ingredients didn’t taste fresh at all and chicken was nothing like chicken. The guy who rolled our burritos, did a pretty bad job and same ingredients were kept together, either eating only rice, beans or chicken. …

6/4/23
I like to start my reviews on a positive note before getting into the critical parts. So the food was enjoyable enough, it certainly wasn't bad by any means. …
Taste was good and the price was also appropriate :) they also had nice music playing. However there are a few points that could easily be improved and change th experience for the better: …

Nice Wraps and Bowls. Fresh food and also good for Vegetarian or Vegan diet.
The prices were ok and the team was friendly!
Big Plus: real Valentinea!!
Minus: no corn tortillas

Fantastic place! Staff are very friendly, service was quick and the price is very wallet friendly. The meal combo is 8,90 for a small burrito or burrito bowl, chips and a drink. Well worth the money. I also found the food to be very fresh and tasty. Love this place.

Really delicious burrito with good quality ingredients! Portion is quite generous even though price is affordable. Big burrito is about 6.5 euros and small burrito is 4.5 euros. For me, the small burrito was enough to make me feel full. Great find in Stuttgart.
Great place, good food. You can get a burrito or a bowl and eat inside or take out
Good and healthy food. If you’re missing tex mex this is the best spot I’ve found so far in Stuttgart!

Amazing place, lovely people and delicious food!
They also have outdoor seating and Combo options are justifying the cost.

OMG, I have eaten at burreatoes for years and I always come back. The food is always amazing and fresh. And the beautiful chubby black-american woman that is always there makes the best bowls. The only thing better than the food is the smiles of the people that work there.

HIGHLIGHT: Burrito & bowl variations, plus an array of salads, at a bright, shabby-chic place with a terrace.

name: Myth & Monello

review text: The server does not know the difference between a vegeterian and vegan dishes, and has served us a wrong one.
Just ok
Mir wurde einfach verschimmeltes Essen verkauft.  Finde es respektlos gegenüber der Kunden und deren Gesundheit. Auf gar keinen Fall ist der Laden empfehlenswert.

Mein Kollege hat hier heute Shrimps geholt. Er hat nur 3 STk. gegessen, weil sie nicht gut schmeckten. Jetzt, 2h später hat er Bauchkrämpfe! Ich hoffe, dass es dabei bleibt, denn als ich einen Shrimp probierte, spuckte ich ihn reflexartig wieder aus, weil er offensichtlich verdorben war!
Essen war sehr lecker, aber auch nicht günstig. Aber jetzt keinen „wow“ Effekt gehabt.

Sehr freundliches Personal und sehr leckere Sachen.
Bin sehr gerne hier einkaufen. Bisher auch nichts vergleichbar leckeres kaufen können an Antipasti. …

Super Oliven und vieles mehr. Fetakäse. Alles zu mitnehmen. Immer gut drauf der Inhaber und Verkäufer. Wenn einem ich stört das er jeden mit ansprechen tut. Ist alles soweit ok. Wenn man was kauft bekommt man oft was um sonst.
Man steht vor der Theke, will eigentlich ordern, aber der Verkäufer ist so sehr mit seinem Smartphone beschäftigt, dass er mein mehrmaliges Hallo nicht hört oder ignoriert, echt der Hammer 👎👎👎 …

Gutschein wurde sehr unhöflich einfach nicht akzeptiert, obwohl auf diesem ausdrücklich diese Filiale aufgeführt wird. Wir wurden zum nächsten laden geschickt. Mieser Service, werde hier (egal bei welcher Filiale) nie wieder etwas kaufen. Geld verschenkt.

Unglaublich unfreundlicher Service. Selten so etwas erlebt. Erst einmal hört der gute Mann ewig nicht auf zu telefonieren und ignoriert mich. Dann wurde ich gefragt ob ich was möchte...nein, ich steh hier nur zum Spaß rum!! …

review text: Good breakfast buffet. Wide selection of hot and cold dishes. Nice room with view of wooded park.

We really enjoyed our dinner here. The food was nice and the service was great.

Spiegelei und Omelette frisch zubereitet. …
